body.p: Cinderella had heard the royal decree, she was amazed that the prince was coming to look for her. Although she knew they had an amazing night of dancing, she had no idea he cared so much for her to come find her. Elated, she waited by the window every day, waiting for her prince to come.

While Cinderella waited, her stepmother schemed. She had no idea it was Cinderella who had danced with the prince and she had her mind set on one of her daughters marrying the prince. But in order for that to happen one of their feet had to fit the glass slipper.
Finally, after many days of waiting, the prince finally arrived at Cinderella’s house. Her stepmother nearly dragged the prince inside, so excited to have him in her home.
“Please, come sit! We are so honored to welcome you to our humble home” she said. Cinderella listened from behind a wall, waiting for the right moment to reveal herself.

Then one of the guards presented the slipper, in all its radiant glory. The first stepsister sat down, prepared to fit her foot inside the shoe no matter the cost. She took a deep breath, scrunched her toes up as tight as she could and shoved the front of her foot inside the shoe. It was quickly apparent that her foot was far too big for the small glass slipper. But this didn’t stop the girl. Without saying a word she ran to the kitchen and grabbed the butcher knife. Before anyone could stop her she slammed the knife down on her two smallest toes and chopped them clean off. Horrified, the prince looked ready to run for the door.

Then one of the guards presented the slipper, in all its radiant glory. The first stepsister sat down, prepared to fit her foot inside the shoe no matter the cost. She took a deep breath, scrunched her toes up as tight as she could and shoved the front of her foot inside the shoe. It was quickly apparent that her foot was far too big for the small glass slipper. But this didn’t stop the girl. Without saying a word she ran to the kitchen and grabbed a stick of butter. She rubbed it all over her foot and once again tried to shove her slippery foot inside the shoe. Horrified, the prince looked ready to run for the door.
“Wait!” the stepmother yelled. “I have one more daughter, I assure you she is the girl you danced with, her foot will fit inside the slipper.”

The prince, although still in shock, was determined to leave no stone unturned and gestured for the other sister to sit down to try the slipper. This time, as the sister slipped her foot in, it slipped in…far too easy. Her foot was much too small for the glass slipper.

“Oh, um,” the stepsister stuttered. “You know what, I just remembered I was wearing socks that night because my feet were chilled, let me go get a pair so you can see.” She rushed off her to bedroom and grabbed not one pair, but six pairs of her thickest, warmest socks. After she managed to get them all on her foot she began to run back down the stairs but because one foot had six pairs of socks on it and the other had none, she tripped and began to fall down the stairs, thudding all the way down.
The prince stood up at once. “Enough!” he said. I will not entertain your lies or trickery any longer, it is clear my princess is not here and I should be going now.”
At that Cinderella burst out from the other room.

“Wait, no please, let me try the slipper,” she began. “My stepmother hid me away today because she thinks I wasn’t at that ball, but I was, we danced all night and it was the most magical few hours of my life. I had to run home because no one in my family could know I was there. I’m sorry you had to go to all this trouble, but I am so grateful you’re here.”

Although he didnt immediately recognize her, the prince was wowed by the girl’s kindness and agreed to let her try on the slipper. The whole room held their breath as Cinderella sat down and took hold of the shoe. In one motion, Cinderella’s foot flawlessly slid in the shoe. It was undeniable, the shoe fit.
